Class Explosion

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Explosion

public class Explosion
extends greenfoot.Actor

An explosion. It starts by expanding and then collapsing. The explosion will explode other obejcts that the explosion intersects.

Version:
1.0.1
Author:
Poul Henriksen

Constructor Summary
Explosion()
          Explosion is the constructer fit iur Explosion objects
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          act will cause the explosion to increase in size until it hits maximum size, then it will decrease in size until it reaches its maximun.

public Explosion()
Explosion is the constructer fit iur Explosion objects

Method Detail

act

public void act()
act will cause the explosion to increase in size until it hits maximum size, then it will decrease in size until it reaches its maximun. Once this occurs, it will remove itself from the world

act in class greenfoot.Actor

There - is no parameters
